title: Zombie Evolution - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Horror   Xianxia
tags: Beasts   Buddhism   Crafting   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Evolution   Fantasy World   Fast Cultivation   Humanoid Protagonist   Jiangshi   Magic Beasts   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated as a Monster   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Ugly Protagonist   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: Zhou LangXian   周郎羡
description: Coincidentally, indoorsy-guy Zhang Yang went to the cultivation world, being the lowest level of zombie. By using a manual book named: “ Tai Yin Refining Figures”, Zhang Yang find his own way to success and leaves a “If a zombie knows how to use a manual, nobody can stop it “ legend in the world.>
